values:
i really cant stand kori. not cuz shes dating josh, but cuz she shoves it in my face every chance she gets. and it pisses me off. i wanna just punch her soooooo bad







well...bye

ooohhh yeaaa. ima heffer. so is steve.


im steve's koolaid and hes the sugar to my mix!!!


and kori is a test tube baby from hell!!

I can't hold on much longer,
If only I were just a little stronger,
Then maybe I would be able to take al the stress,
My whole life is a big mess.
I can't stop cutting or crying,
And no can see that I'm really trying.

I can't hold on anymore,
I've gone cold and my heart is tore.
Everyday I have to resist the gun,
Because if I pull the trigger whats done is done.
Everyday I have to be careful of my knife,
Because cutting to deep could end my life.

Even though I feel worthless and want to die,
The only reason I'm alive is because I don't want him to cry.
He's the only one that helps me out,
He is what my world is all about.
I'll love him even when my heart stops beating,
Through my terrible life he's all I'm needing.

It seems in my family no one seems to care,
Sometimes I wonder if they even want me there.
He tells me to hold on no matter what makes me mad,
He tells me to think of him when getting hits from my step-dad.
When getting slaps from my mom he told me to think of us,
He tells me not to say a word and not to cus.

Every night tears come from my eyes until he calls,
It's unbelievable that he still loves me with all my flaws.
Why does my family have to be so screwed up and hate me,
I try my best to be everything I can be.
But they only point out my mistakes and put my down,
The only facial expression they see from me is a frown.
Holding on is so hard to do,
But I'll hold on just for you.

*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-
Thats a poem that I wrote a while ago. obviously you know who its about. my dislike for kori has grown to PURE HATRED! i hope she chokes on a hot dog. or popcorn. yea, a hot dog or popcorn. you have no idea how  much i want her to DIE. 




DIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

im not really disgusted, just kinda tired. im so bored. steve is with his girlfriend, and i need a new livejournal. but im too lazy to do it. i cant stand his girlfriend. i dont know why either. maybe cuz shes with him ever minute. of every day. well me and jj are friends again. yay. and ashley can die. maybe i hate courtney cuz i have to see her face everyday. sucking on steves tonsils. uuuggghhh. anyway, im done being a jealous bitch



by the way kori...thanks for KILLING and SHREDDING and STEPPING and STABBING my heart. thanks a lot. hope u have fun with him. i did. for almost a year. just remember that. 




*HISS*

im at school. about ready to bite someones head off. whats worse than getting a pass to guidance??? yep, u guessed it...2! ugh why wont she just leave me the hell alone? in case u cant tell im super pissed off. josh broke up with me, then told me he loved me. whatever. i went home and basically shredded my arm to pieces. so im in english, wishing i were dead. i want to call him so bad, but i have to just...not...call him. were still friends, its just...it hurts.
the world sucks. jon fucking hit me, and he didnt get in trouble. so many ppl are pissed off. my mom is about to fucking go off. josh doesnt know what to do. life just sucks.

i had no other idea for a subject. i hate my life so much right now. my grandma has cancer, and it might be very serious. i think its lymphoma cuz she has all the symptoms of it. the only teacher cutting me come slack is mr jensen. and miss delano a little bit, but anyway. and my friend ed is in the hospital. he was hit by a drunk driver. a 19 YEAR OLD DRUNK DRIVER. oh im pissed. i swear to god if i ever see him i will get revenge. then he'll wish he was never born. i knowim not dealing with it either, cuz i tell myself before i go to bed that its just a bad dream that im gonna wake up from. but everyday i wake up, and its not gone. i think all the mental stress is causing physical symptoms. i feel sick, my muscles are so tight it hurts to move, and i have a really bad headache all the time. plus i cant sleep. i just feel so numb, and that i havent had a chance to deal with it yet. i feel like im gonna explode on someone. 



what else can go wrong?

hey everyone! this is my new livejournal. if you want a laugh, look at my old one...www.livejournal.com/users/notoverhim. Thats from summer 2004. Anyway, its almost Thanksgiving!! I'm going to my Aunt's house. I cant wait for my birthday! Im going to my grandmas for dinner, and hopefully josh<3 can come. i guess hes getting my a cell phone for my birthday. omg i will love him forever if he does(not like i dont now). i think i wanna see if he wants to do something tonight. im so bored. im at school, and i have 2 hours left to be bored till mom gets here. wow renee is being such a bitch lately. i told her i didnt care who alex was going out with, so she said i dont who you are, and she hasnt talked to me. then shes talking shit to people in gym and in lunch behind my back. and she wonders why im pissed off at her. hehe i took 4000 mg of tylenol in lunch, and im LOOPY!!! and i hate jon. hes a such a fag. he asked out renee. HA! the 2 little bitches can have each other cuz im so over both of them.





love, me

PS: love you josh
